member.name: T:Unity.Mathematics.AABBExtensions
member.summary: Extensions to Unity.Mathematics to deal with converting Bounds to and from AABB

member.name: M:Unity.Mathematics.AABBExtensions.ToAABB(UnityEngine.Bounds)
member.summary: Convert a Bounds struct to an AABB struct
member.param: the Bounds struct to convert to an AABB struct
member.returns: An AABB struct that is the same as the bounds struct

member.name: M:Unity.Mathematics.AABBExtensions.ToBounds(Unity.Mathematics.AABB)
member.summary: Convert an AABB struct to a Bounds struct
member.param: the AABB struct to convert to a Bounds struct
member.returns: A Bounds struct that is the same as the AABB struct
